name: SSC_DOC_FLOWSHEET
description: This table contains information about patient-level SmartSet Information records with a data row type of Documentation Flowsheet. This table is populated only for patient-level SmartSet Information records with a data row type of Documentation Flowsheet.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient-level SmartSet Information record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: DOC_FLOWSHEET_ID
columns.description: The unique IDs of the Doc Flowsheet Rows or Groups that are associated with this SmartSet Information record and have been added to the patient's chart.

columns.name: DOC_FLOWSHEET_ID_DISP_NAME
columns.description: The display name given to the flowsheet group/row.

columns.name: DOC_FLOWSHEET_DAT
columns.description: The DAT of the Doc Flowsheet Row or Group that is associated with this SmartSet Information record and has been added to the patient's chart.

columns.name: FLOWSHEET_TEMPLT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Flowsheet Template to which the Doc Flowsheet Row or Group from DOC_FLOWSHEET_ID has been added.

columns.name: FLOWSHEET_TEMPLT_ID_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name associated with this template.
